UTME SUBJECT  
(i) UNN requires English Language and any three (3) 
Science subjects - Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics, 
Physics, Health Science, Agricultural Science.   
(ii) UNIZIK requires subject of study and any two (2) 
Science subjects.  
(iii) EBSU – Same as Computer Education.

credit passes to 
include Statistics 
and Mathematics.

other Science Subjects.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY/UTME  
(i) MAUTY as in Education Mathematics.  
(ii) IBADAN requires'O' level credit pass in Mathematics.  
(iii) IBADAN requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at one 
(1) sitting to include English Language and other 
subjects from Science, Social Sciences or Arts.
